meanings.definition: The act of applying too much fertilizer to plants.
meanings.sent1: The overfertilizations in the garden caused the plants to wither.
meanings.sent2: Farmers must be careful to avoid overfertilizations to protect the environment.
meanings.sent3: The overfertilizations turned the once lush garden into a barren wasteland.
meanings.sent4: Her overfertilizations of compliments made him suspicious of her motives.
meanings.sent5: The overfertilizations of nutrients led to an explosion of algae in the pond.

meanings.definition: The state of being excessively fertilized.
meanings.sent1: The overfertilizations of the soil resulted in stunted growth of the crops.
meanings.sent2: The overfertilizations of the lawn made it look unnaturally green.
meanings.sent3: The overfertilizations of love from her parents made the child feel overwhelmed.
meanings.sent4: The overfertilizations of ideas in his mind led to confusion rather than clarity.
meanings.sent5: The overfertilizations of attention on social media can be exhausting.
